nodes.description: 1998年东非美国使馆爆炸案导致224人死亡
nodes.support_text: A former aide of Osama Bin Laden has been sentenced to life in prison for aiding in the bombing of US embassies in east Africa in 1998 that killed 224 people.

nodes.description: Khalid Al-Fawwaz在伦敦被捕（与爆炸案同年）
nodes.support_text: Khalid Al-Fawwaz was arrested in London the same year as the bombings

nodes.description: Al-Fawwaz被引渡至美国（被捕14年后，2012年）
nodes.support_text: was extradited to the US 14 years later

nodes.description: Al-Fawwaz因四项共谋指控于2012年2月被定罪
nodes.support_text: Al-Fawwaz was convicted in February of four conspiracy charges

nodes.description: Manhattan陪审团在受保护的法院宣读终身监禁判决
nodes.support_text: The sentence was read out by a Manhattan jury at a heavily guarded downtown courthouse

nodes.description: 检方指控Al-Fawwaz是基地组织与西方的桥梁
nodes.support_text: called Al-Fawwaz 'bin Laden's bridge to the West'

nodes.description: 辩方律师辩称其身份为政治异见者而非恐怖分子
nodes.support_text: My goal was reform, not rebellion

nodes.description: 检方声称该男子在伦敦运营办公室
nodes.support_text: Prosecutors claimed he operated an office in London where he disseminated Bin Laden's fatwas

nodes.description: 该男子向媒体机构传播本·拉登的宗教 decrees
nodes.support_text: 该男子向媒体机构传播本·拉登的宗教 decrees

nodes.description: Al-Fawwaz被指控利用办公室发送通信设备到基地组织领导人
nodes.support_text: Prosecutors claimed he operated an office in London where he disseminated Bin Laden's fatwas and sent communications equipment to al-Qaeda leaders

nodes.description: Al-Fawwaz向基地组织领导人发送通信设备（包括卫星电话）
nodes.support_text: Al-Fawwaz sent communications equipment, including a satellite phone, to al-Qaeda leaders

nodes.description: al-Nawwaz向在场受害者发表陈述
nodes.support_text: al-Nawwaz向在场受害者发表陈述

edges.support_text: Khalid Al-Fawwaz was arrested in London the same year as the bombings, and was extradited to the US 14 years later
Khalid Al-Fawwaz was arrested in London the same year as the bombings, and later operated an office there
Al-Fawwaz was extradited to the US 14 years later
The sentence was read out by a Manhattan jury at a heavily guarded downtown courthouse
said al-Nawwaz to the victims present in the courtroom
陪审团宣读终身监禁判决后al-Nawwaz向在场受害者发表陈述
called Al-Fawwaz 'bin Laden's bridge to the West'
在伦敦运营办公室期间向媒体机构传播宗教 decrees
在伦敦运营办公室期间向基地组织领导人发送通信设备
传播行为导致其被引渡至美国
发送通信设备导致其被指控
